title: Topper Returns
description: Topper is once again tormented by a fun-loving spirit. This time, it's a beautiful young woman who was accidently murdered while vacationing at the home of her wealthy friend, the intended victim. With Topper's help, she sets out to find her killer with the expected zany results.
